ai-iti63:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti63:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti63:4.1_0: But having fully understood the communicable,
ai-iti63:4.2_0: they don’t identify as a communicator,
ai-iti63:4.3_0: as they’ve touched liberation with their mind,
ai-iti63:5.2_0: peaceful, in love with the state of peace,
ai-iti63:5.3_0: that knowledge-master is firm in principle;
ai-iti63:5.4_0: they use reckonings, but can’t be reckoned.”
ai-iti63:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
